New Records: Virat Kohli scored his 48th ODI hundred
Shubman Gill reached his 10th ODI fifty
Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma fell on the score of 48
Mehidy took two wickets for Bangladesh, Hasan got one
Jasprit Bumrah picked up his second wicket as Mahmudullah departs for 46 in the second ball of the 50th over
Pre-Game Insights: Virat Kohli refused to call it an 'upset' if Bangladesh manage to beat India in the upcoming World Cup clash
Bangladesh have won 3 of their last 4 matches against India, challenging the established narrative of 'upsets'
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli anchored India's 257-run chase with an unbeaten 103
India made it four wins out of four at the Cricket World Cup with a seven-wicket defeat of Bangladesh
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bangladesh's skipper Shakib-Al-Hasan is not playing today too
Bangladesh won the ODI series 2-1 in December 2022
The last time these two teams collided against each other was in the Asia Cup 2023 in September
